name: Heroes of Strategy
description:
Mix of turn base strategy. but company no walk limit. i make 2 map and work on another map. If you thing is this type of game are good. Like pleasy.

Just make a game of my dream

project is not finised but is fuly working. i just want to now if someone play this type of game.

Another thing will by aded to next update. 

Multyplayers is like hmm3 and similar game. Compaing is turned off. you can walk anytheare. on next campain it will by aded turn base.
